description:
Lightweight and breathable performance for your high-output summer activities. The Ostria™ fabric allows air and moisture to move through to speed drying and ensure you won't overheat. The stretch knit design allows unrestricted movement for running, climbing, or any other hot-weather workout.

  • Made of highly breathable Ostria™ polyester to help regulate your temperate and keep you comfortable
  • Durable anti-odour treatment keeps you smelling fresh
  • Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection
name: Arc'teryx Cormac Crew Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's
